data.introduce: 客票解挂服务是中国航信在线分销平台统一解决方案中专为在线分销代理人定制的电子客票产品，以便捷、准确的方式满足代理人在线更改电子客票解挂状态的需求。
data.business:
解挂接口只对”suspend”状态,（即挂起状态）的票号进行解挂。
用户传入票号、Office号，对票号进行解挂操作。
用户传入PNR号和office号+出票日期，进行解挂操作。
解挂使用的配置（office号、工作号）必须与挂起使用同样的配置方可解挂。
data.functions:
对“OFFICE+单张票号”进行解挂操作。
对“PNR号+OFFICE+出票日期”进行解挂操作。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketResumeRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"电子客票解挂请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？：？","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"请求者代码","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"主控航司：主控航司,B系统必传","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"eTicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"电子票号","children":[]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR号 信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR号上下文","children":[]}]},{"name":"issueDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出票日期","children":[]},{"name":"@SysType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"C","description":"系统类型：系统类型:默认值C(CRS), 可选值B(ICS)","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketResumeRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"电子客票解挂响应","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告详细 信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"ResumeIsOK","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"解挂是否成功","children":[]}]}]
